project.name: artwork
project.description: The Gentoo Artwork Project manages Gentoo artwork stuff. This includes wallpapers, logos, themes, icons sets, etc.

longdescription.p: As community using Gentoo as a desktop operating system continues to grow, the main thing for much users is to make their favorite distribution appearance eye candy. We created our project for exactly such users! Gentoo Artwork Project (GAP) is a desktop subproject and is responsible for creation and maintenance of all artwork stuff.

body.p: Gentoo Artwork Project is open to all offers. If you would like to get involved to our project feel free to ask developer on IRC channel #gentoo-artwork on irc.freenode.net, or via e-mail. All artwork stuff you can send to us will be greatly appreciated.
